html:
with a strong hand. This expression means "with power." This phrase is "a code used to describe the basic experience of a prophet who was receiving a message; apparently Isaiah is using a formula which had long since come into general use" (see 1 Kgs. 18:46; Ezek. 3:14; 8:1).

walk in the way of this people. To travel in the paths of the wicked.
